subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: When Secretariat flashed across the line in the 1973 Preakness Stakes, it seemed he had fallen a full second short of the Preakness record of 1:54. Or had he?
snippet: When Secretariat flashed across the line in the 1973 Preakness Stakes, it seemed he had fallen a full second short of the Preakness record of 1:54. Or had he?
